attributes.action: give the britsh citizens first prority on housing allocations, and make asylum seekers sign a statement that if staying in britain to abide by british law. mr brown you must give prority to your citizens first... please
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am currently homeless with three kids, 2 of whom have illnesses and have attended hospital since they were babies, through no fault of mine ( the landlord is selling the property) I have had to move in with my mum, I cant get accomodation but there are asylum seekers being moved into properties left right and centre, I feel if your born here, you have no rights any more, but if you get asylum here then you have more priority over everything. I know there are cases where there is a need but its getting beyond a joke now, people are starting to get sick to the back teeth of asylum seekers, take care of your own first mr brown.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
